TopicTitle: This did not work out as planned...

Articles.Content: Rayby Kerman swears he didn't do it on purpose....

Welcome to the community Tokay Gris

Wow, that pic really shows how big the Mun arches are, plus that's some impressive parking

Have fun finding the monoliths and the other thing on the Mun, fly safe!

Welcome to the forums!

How'd you get your ship to land on the arch and not fall off? Half the time my Kerbals fall and slide right off, then plummet to their doom (unless I can get their RCS to work in time )

Thanks for the warm welcome!

I actually have no idea how Rayby did this. He did mumble something about "switched on the autopilot and took a nap, and when I woke up, thats where we were parked".

The sad thing is that the ship was actually the first part of my Mun base. It was supposed to land on preferably flat ground so I could dock some additions to it. Which now is not possible of course. Unless I take it to the ground first, which I'd hate to do....

;-)
Nice landing. The craft looks pretty sweet too. Welcome.

That's either some really good piloting, or a great advertisement for McJeb.

Either way good job.
Welcome to the forums! Looks like we had the same idea, I built a base in that same spot
